Value: Stops all enemies in a target area from casting spells. The area of effect and duration increase with level. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Small area, lasts 12 seconds (4 for Heroes). |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Medium area, lasts 14 seconds (5 for Heroes). |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Medium area, lasts 16 seconds (7 for Heroes). |n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Large area, lasts 18 seconds (9 for Heroes).
